entities.description: The classification of a respondent with cocaine use disorder based on meeting two or more criteria in the past year.
Demotion at work as an outcome of cocaine use.
Losing a job as a consequence of cocaine use.
Missing a lot of work or school due to cocaine use.
Getting suspended, expelled, or dropping out of school due to cocaine use.

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent meets the criteria for cocaine use disorder within the past year.
Cocaine use resulting in getting demoted at work.
Cocaine use resulting in job loss.
Cocaine use leading to frequent absenteeism at work or school.
Cocaine use leading to school suspension, expulsion, or dropping out.
